name: Wednik
tag_list: wedding, wedding-planning, wedding-management, wedding-planner, wedding-budget, wedding-management-tools
overview:
Wednik provides DIY wedding planning tools and wedding planners marketplace where experienced planners offer affordable services to guide & assist the brides remotely.

Wednik provides a suite of intelligent tools for budgeting, planning, tracking and collaboration. For brides who need help can choose to work with a remote wedding planner for as little as $199. Wednik lets brides to collaborate with their friends and family to get ideas and share tasks. It also provides financial planning guidance to help brides figure the budget they can afford and makes a saving and borrowing plan for them to have enough for the wedding. Wednik stays vendor neutral and lets the brides find good vendors via Yelp and Google places.

Disruption:

  1. Remote Planners - Change the way Wedding Planners work. Most wedding planning tasks can be done remotely. Our wedding planner market place will connect brides and planners that may not be in the same location. This results into more business for the planners and affordable prices for the brides.

  2. Vendor neutral - Instead of providing a directory of vendors who pay to get listed, Wednik stays Vendor neutral. We give brides access to Yelp and Google place results so they get a fair view of vendors. This eliminates the need for vendors paying high listing fees to wedding websites like Wedding Wire.

  3. Responsible Borrowing - By inserting financial planning into the wedding planning process we intend to change how couples budget and finance their wedding. This will impact the wedding loan business in the US.
